poem:
### Aiming to Heal

In the House where echoes linger,  
voices weave through musty air,  
words that pin hopes on invisible maps—  
promise of less hunger, less cold stares.  
If only speeches could break bread  
or erase the lines of wear,  
then perhaps hearts would spread  
their wings beyond mere repair.
